scripts.copy-assets: rm -r -f public/assets && mkdir public/assets && cp -r src/assets/* public/assets && cp -r documentation/assets/* public/assets
scripts.copy-static: rm -r -f public/static && mkdir public/static && cp -r src/static/* public/static
scripts.start: npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-static && npm run develop
scripts.build: npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-static && gatsby build
